title: "you just received a reward"
body: I just got this message but as I was about to click on it, it dissapeared :S now I have no clue what the reward is lol

replies.body:
I had the same, but in alpha client, you can hit the notification bell up right to see them.
If it can help, i received 2 summoners icons. That lucky red thing with some coins around, and the poro king. ;)
Same to me,but im from EUNE i log in to my acc,and i had 2 notification that  said "Reward Received" with chest pictures,idk what is that ? sorry for my bad eng {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} xd

I just got the exact same thing, and then went looking to find out what........ but could not find anything new

this is quite strange riot... where is our rewards please? :)   

hint hint nudge nudge. <3

We have a [status banner ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-)on this now for more clarity.  Toast notifications were enabled on the updated client, so you're just seeing announcements for content you've already received.  Nothing new, I'm afraid!
Just another stupid poro icon... thanks riot
It happened to me, said I received it an hour ago, said I had earned snowday singed, but I already own it, bought it during snowdown, so I am confused.
Toast notifications are being tested on the updated client, so what players are seeing notifications for old content they've already received.

Same thing happened to me. I'm pretty sure it just gave me the season 3 TSM icon as well. I never had that one before, but the notifications told me I got it, and now I have it.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I don't see anything on your account since the Poro King icon on the 18th.  If you're on the updated client, you might see a backlog of notification toasts even though you've already received them.  Let me know if that clears things up!
oooh there's a backlog! yeah it's that icon O.o so weird that I just got the notification, also I had no idea that the bell was a deployable menu :S thanks either way!
Yeah, it's not intentional- I don't believe.  Sometimes notifications or balance may not appear in-sync, and usually returning to the legacy client can fix it too.  Glad to help!
